New Records: Nikola Jokic's third straight triple-double and fifth of the season
Jamal Murray became the first player in Nuggets franchise history with 1,000 career 3-pointers
Key Match Events: Denver raced out to a 17-6 lead in the opening 4:10 as part of a 40-point first quarter
The Nuggets outscored the Heat 15-4 in the opening 3:03 of the third quarter to extend its advantage to 86-64
Jimmy Butler turned his ankle on a drive against Murray seven minutes into the game and did not return
Post-Match Reflections: Heat's fourth loss in its past five games came with the added pain of losing Butler
Denver continued its recent surge, winning for the sixth time in the past seven games after an 0-2 start
Miscellaneous Highlights: Russell Westbrook continued a strong recent stretch, dishing out a season-high 10 assists for Denver
The Nuggets host the Dallas Mavericks on Sunday, the same day the Heat continue a six-game road swing at the Minnesota Timberwolves
Others: Tyler Herro had a team-high 24 points and 11 assists for the Heat
